ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog /so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes slobs la/ /phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zungs shig /mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //gzhon nu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / med pas mi skur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang gis de bzhin
gshegs par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas par rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon
nu| sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu
sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste/ gzhon nu/ de ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid
kyang de yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa chos thams
cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don gcig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa
ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams
gsum las 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so/ /ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra/ rnam pa gzhan du mi smra/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed/ khams
gsum la ma chags shing khams gsum las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang / gzugs kyi sa dang / gzugs med pa'i sa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa dang
ming gis dang / sgra'i sa las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pa /brjod du med pa'i chos rtogs pa/ yi ge shes
pa| yi ge la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes
pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la dbab pa'i blo dang ldan
zhing | bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag
khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang / chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor thob nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis de dag thams cad la bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya ste| thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad/ tshe'i tshad ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o
zhes lung bstan to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pa gang / /bla na med pa'i byang chub rab 'tshol zhing / /chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa
de| |chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin/ /yang dag ma yin pa yi tshig mi smra/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te/
dpa' bo the tshom bral bas shin tu rig/ chos kun don gcig par ni rab shes te/ /mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas/ /de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa med/ /don gcig
la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med pa dang / /dmigs pa med par blo gros ldan pas shes/ /zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang / /ma lus par
ni thams cad rab tu spangs/ /de ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la/ /stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs su mi lta zhing / /de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas/ /mtshan rnams su yang
lta bar yod mi 'gyur/ /chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab/ /bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi/ /de lta bur ni rab shes nas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong
ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig /de bzhin kun tu blo yang gtong / /chos kun de yi rang bzhin te/ /rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /yid la nam yang 'byung ba med/ /
chos rnams thams cad shes pas na/ /khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ /de la smon lam 'debs pa med/ /yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing / /ma log
tshig smra rnam pa gzhan mi smra/ /de yi tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang / /rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang / /gzugs
dang gzugs med las kyang shin tu 'da'/ /chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing / /rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan par spyod/ /ming gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes/ /
ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste/ /ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang / /de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin/ /'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med/ /lta ba log pa kun nas zad/ /
blo yang shin tu gtan la phab/ /brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod/ /gal te bdud bye khrag khrig rnams/ /de yi sems dkrug phyir 'ongs kyang / /bdud rnams thams cad zil
mnan te/ /de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /bdud kyi rgya mo rnams spangs te/ /tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba med/ /bsam gtan dag gi bde la mos/ /'jig rten stong par
rab tu shes/ /'jig rten phung por smras pa yang / /de dag stong par rab tu rig /skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ /chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin/ /de dag
bdag nyid gtong byed kyi/ /stobs bcu'i tshul khrims thos mi gtong / /de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par
'gro/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong / /mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de/ /smon lam rnams ni yongs mi gtong / /chos nyid dag ni de spyod tshe/ /skad cig
brtson 'grus nyams mi byed/ /phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /de ni shin tu bstod pa yin/ /de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin las/ /chos 'di dag ni rab thob nas/ /shes kyi
khe ni rnam spongs la/ /skye bo mang la chos rab ston/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa/ /rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pas/ /dge ba 'di la rab bslabs na/ /stobs
kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur slob pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
pa la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin
nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid me mnyam pa med pa dang / mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/ kun nas slong ba med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med
pa| rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / kun nas rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags
dang | zhe sdang dang / gti mug yongs su chad pa/ mtha' med pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi
ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa
med pa'i sa/ zhi ba'i sa spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/ yon tan thams
cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la
gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin/ sems 'khrul pa med pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa/ /shin tu mthong dka' phra zhing zhi/ /'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste/ /de phyir
ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med/ /gzung ba med cing bstan du med/ /sems kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces
bya| |nam zhig mnyam par gzhag gyur te/ /chos kun la ni rlom sems med/ /rlom sems med pa ji bzhin pa/ /de ni ting nge 'dzin ces bsgrags/ /chos ni rdul tsam yod
med de/ /rdul ces bya ba'ang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams dmigs su med pa ste/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang / /de ni rnam par rtog ces
bya| |chos de rnam par ma brtags pa/ /de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis/ /sgra yis don rnams rab bstan te/ /sgra de nyid kyang dngos po med/ /sgra ni brag ca lta bu ste/ /bar
snang dag gi nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te/ /'di dag la ni gnas mi dmigs/ /mi gnas pa ni gnas kyi sgra/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do/ /'gro zhing
'chi 'phor brjod pa yi/ /de lta bu yi 'gro ba med/ /'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras/ /ting nge 'dzin du de phyir gsungs/ /mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod/ /
mnyam gzhag 'di yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/ /rlom sems med par byang chub rim par spyod/ /dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog /mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi
ba sangs rgyas sa/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sa 'di bsten byas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin/ /don gyi rnam par rig pa 'jug pa la/ /
yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus te/ /sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin
'di| |ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na/ /gal te zhing 'di bskal pas 'tshig gyur kyang / /ri mchog dbus su zhugs pas mes mi 'tshig /bskal pa brgya phrag mang por
rab bsregs kyang / /nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin/ /chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas/ /de ni me yi nang du yong mi 'tshig /gal te sangs rgyas
zhing rnams 'bar gyur la/ /'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi zhig ces/ /ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na/ /sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul
stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /nam mkha' la yang thogs pa med par 'gro /rjes su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag myong / /skye
zhing 'chi 'phor de 'gyur yang / /skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med/ /gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa/ /de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/ /'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos
rab tu bshad/ /de ltar 'jig rten mgon rig nas/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig /'jig rten gyis ni ma gos shing / /'jig rten chos la mi chags
te| |lus ni thogs pa med par ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /zhing dag na ni 'jig rten 'dren/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong / /sangs rgyas dag gis
zhing bshad pa/ /chos rnams de dag der yang nyan/ /de la mi shes yong med de/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang rab tu 'chad/ /chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig /de ni chos kyi dbyings
kyi tshul/ /bskal pa bye bar 'chad ston kyang / /de yi spobs pa zad mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan mang po/ /mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sprul pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma stong dag la/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag /zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni/ /gzungs dang mdo sde
bzang po dang / /mdo sde gzhan yang bye ba dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston/ /sems can mang po bsam mi khyab/ /phyir mi ldog la 'god par byed/ /sangs rgyas byang
chub rab ston kyang / /spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur/ /rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /khang pa brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste/ /dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis/ /'dren pa la
yang mngon par 'thor/ /dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang / /'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor/ /de dag thams cad byang chub phyir/ /rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa
yi| |yon tan dpag med de dag ni/ /nam zhig nyon mongs med gyur pa/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag thob/ /nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing / /dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba/ /mi 'phrugs
'dus ma byas pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo/ /rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi/ /nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral/ /spros med rnam par ma spros pa/ /spros pa dag las
shin tu 'das/ /yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de/ /dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na/ /de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /zad mi shes shing nye bar
zhi| |lhun gyis 'grub cing bstan med pa/ /rnyog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / /spros med lhun gyis grub pa
yi| |chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bslab pa ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas/ /yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ /tshu rol dang ni pha
rol med/ /sngon mtha' rnam par ma brtags te/ /de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun/ /yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin/ /'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang / /spros med lhun gyis grub pa

yi| |chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni/ /de dag de las pha rol phyin/ /ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las longs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spobs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas
bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do/ /'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing / /sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can
gzigs nas ni/ /skye dgu thar byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/ /byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed/ /dpa' bos bskal pa bye ba mang spyad de/ /sbyin dang dul dang
legs sdom rtag tu gnas/ /bzod dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus des/ /sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin/ /rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rab gtong zhing / /khyod
kyi yid la nam yang skyo med de/ /gser dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang / /chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong / /khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste/ /bdag
nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams/ /bde gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzod la dgyes shing bzod
pa'i lam la gnas/ /lus ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrugs med de/ /byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma zags/ /bde gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs
bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing / /chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rtogs/ /thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje/ /skye dgu 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse
ba| |stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni/ /de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis/ /
rnam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med/ /so sor brtags te bag med thams cad spangs/ /bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom/ /ye shes mtha' yas byang
chub rgya cher mkhyen/ /mchog tu rnam dag zhi pa'i tshos kyang ston/ /zla ba skar mar bcas pa gnam lhung zhing / /ri dang grong du bcas pa'i sa zhig la/ /nam mkha'i khams ni
rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang / /khyod ni mi bden pa yi tshig mi gsung / /skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang / /sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni/ /stong
pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yin/ /dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par mdzad/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /mi dmigs pa yi bslab pa la/ /dpa' bo chen pos
bslabs pas na/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa/ /de lta bu yi chos ston te/ /mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang / /byis pa dag gis sa
'di min/ /bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas pa/ /mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur/ /chos rnams bdag med rig pas na/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /dpa' bo chen po
yang dag gsung / /yang dag chos la rab tu gnas/ /mgon po yang dag bden gnas te/ /yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung / /khyod kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi yang dag
spyod pa byung / /yang dag de yi rgyu 'dra bas/ /yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung / /yang dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag mtha' la shin tu bslabs/ /yang dag bsam pa yang
dag spyod/ /yang dag mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa med/ /ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa/ /ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing / /ye shes gsung
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te/ /sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen khyod/ /ri rab bzhin du mi sgul te/ /mi g.yo rab tu gnas pa po/ /ston pa'i 'khor
tshogs rgya che yang / /tshogs mang dag kyang sdud par mdzad/ /shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs/ /'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sgrog /sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
shing | |seng ge'i stabs su rnam par gshegs/ /khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba/ /seng ge yis ni wa rnams bzhin/ /dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa/ /ma dul ba dag khyod
kyis btul/ /de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur che/ /dbyer mi phyed cing legs par gnas/ /lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni/ /sdug dang
mi sdug med pa yi/ /bdag med chos ni khyod ston te/ /ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag /log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams/ /'dren pa gang nas gshegs
pa yi| |lam yang rab tu khyod kyis bstan/ /bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas/ /gang la sdug bsngal med pa yi/ /bdag med de dag mi shes
so| |'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston te/ /khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon/ /khyod ni ma log pa yi tshig gsung ste/ /sdug bsngal mang thar mdzad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /lha klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag /brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas/ /thams cad 'dren
la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la 'thad/ /mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor/ /gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan/ /
phan byed skye bo mang po thar byed pa/ /sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / /lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog /shin tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor
gyur kyang / /bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis non/ /khu byug bya mang 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin dang / /kun la shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag /bya tshogs
mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi phod/ /lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang / /sil snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang / /pi wang rdza rnga rnga chen
dung gi sgra/ /de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod/ /khu byug ne tso ri skegs sgra rnams dang / /khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am ci yi sgra/ /sgra dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa/ /de dag
sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod/ /snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang / /shin tu mnyen la rab bsngags zhi ba'i tshig /dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar 'gyur yin/ /lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang / /srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa/ /'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag
ni| |bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis non/ /bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan/ /bsod nams
brgyas grub dag cing rnam par dang / /rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu lhan/ /dung gi sgra dang 'khar rnga sgra snyan dang / /rnga'i sgra de bzhin kim pa la yi sgra/ /rab tu 'jam zhing
'thad pa'i sgra de kun/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra/ /sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa lha yi 'dra/ /lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs
dgar 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /khrung khrung rma bya ngur pa khu byug dang / /ngang pa ku nal rnam mang bya yi tshogs/ /
de dag sgra snyan dus gcig tshogs pas kyang / /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod/ /klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang / /lha dbang tshangs pa lha yi bdag po'i
sgra| |srid gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa ci yod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod/ /tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang / /nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin chen 'od/ /
kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag /'od kun rgyal ba'i 'od kyis zil gyis non/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag /ye shes dag pa srid pa gsum na gos
pa med/ /mi dbang yon tan dbyig tshogs yon tan rin chen mnga'/ /rang byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam/ /de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod
nas ni/ /gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa/ /sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis/ /shAkya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig
smra| |bde bar gshegs pas de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas/ /mi dbang chags med ye shes mnga' ba 'dzum pa mdzad/ /stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de zhus
te| |'dran pas gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad/ /sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos/ /lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste/ /shin tu sems rangs
mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis/ /bde gshegs zil gyis ma non de dag lung bstan gsol/ /skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
dag gi sa ma lags/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ye shes rnam dag dpe med ye shes ma lus gsungs/ /shAkya'i seng+ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren
pa| |rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug sel/ /rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags/ /byang chub dam pa mchog
'di rab tu 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /'dren pa khyod kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed dang / /de las lhag par yang ni spyod pa rab tu spyod/ /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol//
ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang yongs su btang ba mdzad/ /sras dang btsun mo gnyen bshes rtsa lag phangs pa btang / /thub
pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags/ /rta dang ba glang dang ni shing rta rkang thang dang / /bran dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang / /spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma
btang ba/ /rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med/ /srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog tu gyur/ /sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa rab tu
mkhyen/ /sems dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad/ /mi yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod/ /gang gi don ni
rgya che yangs par 'gyur/ /spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin/ /thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /pad+ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan
gser gyi pad+ma shin tu 'od gsal ba/ /mdzes shing yid du 'thad pas las byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba/ /rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po de la mchis/ /chos
smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te/ /'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu/ /rnga dang dung dang 'khar rnga sgra chen dang / /sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yi/ /de dag sgra ni nam mkha' 'di
las gda'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab/ /khrung khrung ngang pa ka la ping+ka dang / /khu byug bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa phyung ba
yang | |de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod/ /gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams/ /sngon gyi bskal pa mang por bsnyen par bgyis/ /gang gis mi yi gtso bo
rab mchod na/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes/ /gang gis rkang gnyis gtso la sngon
tshad zhus/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /stobs bcu ldan pa ji snyed 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon bde gshegs dang / /mi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /
de phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags/ /srog chags kun gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang / /mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra dang / /skye dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /
de phyir mi yi gtso la zhu ba lags/ /rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa/ /spyod pa mchog la su dag spyod pa rnams/ /de phyir
bdag ni rkang gnyis gtso la zhu/ /gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dka'i chos/ /stong pa zhi ba mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgoms pa rnams/ /
de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o/ /srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir/ /gang gis byams pa snying rje rab bsgoms shing / /gang la sems can 'du shes med pa
dag |de phyir rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu'o/ /gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la ni gzung ba yong med de/ /sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol
phyin| |de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o/ /tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyin/ /dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug /khyod la 'khrul
pa dag ni mi mnga' na/ /su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan/ /shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags maud+gal bu/ /bde gshegs nyan thos gzhan gang su mchis pa/ /'di la de dag
ye shes mi 'jug ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/ /bslabs pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags/ /'dren
pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bskyed la/ /don dam mkhyen pa gsung sgra dbyung bar gsol/ /sngon gang bskal pa bye ba mang por yang / /skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam
ste| |de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang gnyis gtso dris pa/ /'dren pas de yi 'bras bu deng gsung zhig /gang zag chen pos lung bstan mnyan pa'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul
bum gsang ba po/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing / /thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas/ /byang chub sems dpa'
'phrul ldan mang po mchis/ /bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar zhing gus pas 'khod/ /shAkya seng+ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir/ /mi
'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun bdar mchis/ /shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i
phyir| |bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas/ /mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis/ /gang dag sngan chad
bskal pa bye mang snyed/ /ye shes dam pa mchog 'di 'tshol ba'i phyir/ /rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa/ /'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar
te mchis/ /sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khrig spyad bgyis kyang / /'di 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ste/ /legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can/ /thams cad thal mo
rab sbyar gus par 'khod/ /ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu/ /snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis/ /'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs
su brjod pa gsungs/ /rgyal ba rnam 'dren gleng gzhi ma mchis par/ /gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa/ /rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung
dbyangs dbyung du gsol/ /ngang pa khu byug rma bya sa ra sa/ /'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin/ /lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /sems can
grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig /byams pa skyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid/ /ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste/ /don la rtog cing shes rab 'phel bgyid cing / /
bskal ba khrag khrig bye bar rnam sbyong ba/ /rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig /sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston/ /mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam
par 'joms/ /stong pa srog med sems can med pa sgom/ /bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir spyad de/ /lha rnams
stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod/ /tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dad bgyid de/ /klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzang grol bar bgyid/ /
rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste/ /las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyungs shig /rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang / /gang dag ma byon pa dang bzhugs pa rnams/ /
thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mnga'/ /'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags/ /'byung po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /sa 'di thams cad rnam pa
drug tu g.yos/ /lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor/ /lha yi spos ngad yid du 'ong ba ldang / /'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsal/ /tshul khrims yongs dag
yid kyang yongs su dag /mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dgyes/ /seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can/ /spobs dang ldan zhing shin tu snyan pa yangs/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab
rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs/ /thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med/ /gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ /rma bya khu byug ka la ping+ka'i sgra/ /shang shang te'u'i sgra yang yid
'ong ba/ /dga' 'gyur skad kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang / /bde gshegs gsung gi char ni des mi phod/ /rnga dang rdza rnga 'khar rnga de bzhin te/ /dung dang gling bu de bzhin pi wang
dang | |sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig tu 'dus/ /de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi phod/ /lha yi sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra/ /lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / /rol
mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba skyed bgyid pa/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phod/ /'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las/ /mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung ste/ /rgyal
ba bdag la ston snyam so so sems/ /gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad bstan/ /lha yi sgra dang de bzhin klu yi skad/ /mi 'am ci yi sgra snyan ci mchis pa/ /de dag nam yang nyon
mongs zhi mi bgyid/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs sel/ /dga' ba skyed cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags/ /byams pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags
shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags/ /sangs rgyas gsung gis dri ma thams cad sel/ /'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung / /thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang
gcod/ /mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa/ /thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston/ /ri dang nags bcas sa 'di gas gyur cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin bas
gyur la/ /zla ba nyi ma sa la lhung gyur kyang / /rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur/ /tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung / /seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen
pa'i dbyangs/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje can/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /'jig
rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang / /sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba ji snyed su dag thugs rje can/
dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni/ /rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs med pa/ /gang+gA'i

bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang / /yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus pa/ /gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/ /'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka' stsal pa/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid
kyis| |mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pa/ /rtag tu khor mor shin tu bsngags par 'gyur/ /sngon yang rgyal
po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong / /rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis/ /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris/ /byang chub spyod
pa mchog 'di spyad pa na/ /'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur te/ /thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur/ /kun tu rtag par tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /de ni phyi dus 'jigs pa
chen po la/ /'di la ma pham khyod nyid nga yi dpang / /rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu rgyas byed 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab 'tshol
zhing | |lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub des thob 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yongs bzungs te/ /'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur/ /nga ni ye shes la yang
rab gnas te/ /zla 'od spyod pa khyad zhugs lung bstan cing / /'di yi srog dang tshangs par spyod pa dag /phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med par bya/ /lag
mthil skyu ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin/ /ma 'ongs pa na gang la mchod 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang / /de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed shes/ /lha dang
klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang / /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dag /phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed/ /rkang gnyis
gtso la mchod pa mchog byas te/ /ye shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas/ /phyi ma'i dus la de ni 'jig rten mgon/ /rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur/ /zla 'od
gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi/ /lung bstan 'di thos dga' bas rgyas gyur te/ /ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas/ /mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa
brjod/ /e ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa/ /rnam grol ye shes bdag po stobs la gnas/ /shin tu nges pa'i ye shes mchog gnas pas/ /pha rol rgol ba
dag gis zil mi non/ /chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg /dngos po rnam bshig srid par chags mi mdzad/ /khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'/ /
srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug /spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing / /lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs/ /lam yang shin tu bsgoms shing gnas med
pa| |zil gyis mnon su dang mi 'phrod med/ /khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas med de/ /chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs/ /srid pa'i 'khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag
bcad/ /srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen cing / /brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thugs su chud/ /mu stegs phyin ci
log la gnas pa dag /mi mkhas de bzhin seng+ges wa bzhin bshig /bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter/ /gter mchog dam pa bdag gis deng thob ste/ /ngan
'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs/ /'dren par mi 'gyur snyam pa'i the tshom med/ /gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba/ /phyag brkyang de yi mgo la rab bzhag nas/ /lhar
bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dpang bkod de/ /mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad/ /'dzum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad
srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams
rab tu dgod par 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang
bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya
cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan
song thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams
cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung ste bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems can
rnams rab tu 'god de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang myur du thob bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /
sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni/ /bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la/ /dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang / /de yi ming ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya/ /nga ni blo
gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu/ /na bar gyur te mi bzad sdug bsngal tshor/ /de tshe tshangs pas byin pa chos smra ba/ /nga yi slob dpon du ni gyur pa yin/ /nga ni sman pa lnga brgya mi nyung ba/ /
brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpyad gso bar byed/ /nga yi nad ni gso bar ma nus nas/ /nga yi gnyen bshes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur/ /nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas/ /nad
dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs/ /tshangs byin nga la brtse ba rab bskyed nas/ /ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur/ /nga ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas/ /'phags pa'i dga'
bzang zing med pa skyes/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas/ /nga yang de yi dus na nad las sos/ /mar me mdzad ni spyad pa spyod pa na/ /dge slong chos smra mkhas par gyur pa
yin| |nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur te/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar/ /de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis phyi dus na/ /yongs su nyams pa 'di
dag rjes dran zhing / /byis pas nyes par brjod pa'i tshig bzod gyis/ /ting 'dzin 'di yang gzung la legs par lhogs/ /phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag /brkam zhing gtum
la ma bsngams 'byung bar 'gyur/ sdig la dga' zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phrag dog can/ /
grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag /sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdob/ /rtse 'jo
rgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs/ /gcig la gcig ni mgul 'khyud lag kyang sbrel/ /grong du spyod lam gzhan du sgyur bar byed/ /mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste/ /
gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags/ /gzugs kyis rgyugs shing 'dun pa bor ba yin/ /grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu/ /de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu
zhugs/ /glu dang bro gar de bzhin rol mo dang / /nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson/ /btung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor/ /mi rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar
byed| |tshul khrims de bzhin lam dag btang nas ni/ /khyim pa dag dang bsten cing khrims dral nas/ /de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas/ /las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag
smad pa/ /srang dang tshad la g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs/ /de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas/ /las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro /dung dang gser dang nor bu nor mang dang / /khyim
dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab byung ste/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/ /sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed/ /nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing / /
bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags/ /gang la bslab pa'i nan tan med pa rnams/ /de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs/ /ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na/ /bskal pa stong du
shin tu dka' spyad de/ /nga yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na/ /de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs/ /de dag yun ring brdzun smra tshangs mi spyod/ /rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song
gzhol/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni chos min smra/ /de dag phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste/ /rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa 'tshol//
gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de/ /shi 'phos nas ni ngan song sar yang 'gro/ de dag brgya dang stong gi nang na yang / /de tshe bzod pa'i stobs ldan shin tu dkon/ /de phyir 'thab
la brtson pa mang po 'byung / /bzod pa spangs nas rab tu spros pa byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' nged yin tshig tu smra/ /de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su
'gro| mi bden sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te/ /tshul khrims nyams la byang chub ga la yod/ /gang la bsam pa rnam par dag med cing / /chos 'di la yang bzod pa med pa dang / /
chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa/ /ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong / /de dag 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim spangs te/ /rab tu byung nas shin tu dam du 'dzin/ /
skyes bu dam pa'i theg pa spangs byas nas/ /bye brag lhag par 'dod pa brlag par 'gyur/ /shes rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa/ /theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu
brjod/ /gang gi skyabs su de dag rab zhugs pa/ /de nyid la yang nyes pa brgya dag brjod/ /'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun mi 'dod/ /byis
pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas/ /stong pa nyid ni thos nas skrag par 'gyur/ /phan tshun du yang rtsod pa byas nas ni/ /gnod sems khong khro tha ba rab tu skyed/ /phan tshun du yang
skur ba mngon 'debs shing / /sdig pa byas nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed/ /gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan/ /byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa/ /
mnyen zhing des la shin tu bsdams pa rnams/ /de dag de tshe yongs su brnyas par 'gyur/ /gang la shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang / /mi bzad ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa/ /
chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'/ /de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur/ /bsgo bar bya zhing rab tu go bar bya/ /gzhon nu nga la dad pa'i phyir 'brang na/ /bde bar gshegs
pas bstan pa 'di dran nas/ /de dag la ni nam yang yid mi rton/ /de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che/ /gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags/ /lus kyang ma dul ngag kyang
ma dul zhing / /sems kyang ma dul ngan song gzhol ba yin/ /nga ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na/ /dge slong yon tan dag la mi spyod de/ /tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur/ /
nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //de nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ ri yi rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par
bde gshegs bzhud/ /'jig rten sgron ma der yang gshegs nas ni/ /khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs su bcad
bas btang ba/ ri yi rgyal por rgyal ba mngon gnas par/ /ma pham bdud rnams pham byas khyod song zhig /der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang / /bla na med pa myur du grub
par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la
yid kyis phyag btsal/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'khor de nas byung ste sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal
po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod la ri'i rgyal po bya
rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa rgya che ba/ sdong du ma dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing kho ra khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis
brlabs te/ sa gzhi rin po che an+da rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs
med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu spras pa/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nye 'khor brgyan cing spud de/ bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa 'thul bar byas
phreng ba dang lda ldis ni brgyan/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang / khyams kyi dkyil 'khor
du ni bla re bres/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te/ rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting / ka tsa lin+da ltar
'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs/ steng du snying po beg tsher ni bting / snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu zheng dang 'phang du
dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi'i las 'das pa/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ ras rin po che bcos
bus g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i khri la btags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal bar 'byung / phyogs kun tu ni nor bu rin po che chen pos
snang bar gyur/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bai DUR+ya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan
pa mngon par sprul nas skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to/ /zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan
'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug go /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba/ /rin chen rdo steng bzang zhing dga' ba dang / /
bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams/ /dbus su rin chen seng+ge'i khri yang btsugs/ /lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing / /phyogs su nor bu rin chen 'od cher
'byung / /rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bai DUR+ya/ /ma pham rgyal ba'i sras pos de ltar sprul/ /ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra/ rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam
du| |byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas/ /skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du zhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par
bstan te/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yang dag par btsud de gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon pa dang / byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang
na yod pa der gshegs te byon nas byams pas mngon par sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
mi ma yin pas ni phyag byas te 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad lhags par gyur pa rnams dang /
'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
thogs nas rol mo ni byed/ pheg ni rdob/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan ni sgreng / phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gang na yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
dang | na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gus pa dang ldan
ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phye'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig /de skad ces bka' stsal te go skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
shing 'grogs na bde ba yin/ dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin te/ de pha rol gyis gshes sam/ spyos pa'i tshig nyes par smra zhing / nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod
cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhin can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ chos dang po 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag cing
tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang / tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul
khrims mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang / tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang / mkhas pas
bstod pa'i tshul khrims pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ chos gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
yang | gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang / sems dngangs pa dang / skyo ba dang / don du mi gnyer cing mngon par
mi dga' ba dang / ma chags ma zhen pa dang / khams gsum la yid skyo bas khams gsum las gzhan du sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtson zhing
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad cing chos yongs su 'tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du
thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur byed pa ma yin/ shes kyi khe lhur byed pa ma yin/ phan pa'i dngos po
sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi/ ci nas
sems can 'di rnams chos 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam pa ste/ gzhon nu/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gzhon nu/ rnam grangs 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag
par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bstod pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam
pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo / /dris shing bcangs so/ /bklags so/ /bton to/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgoms shing mang du
byas so/ /gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon
byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dpag
yas na/ /rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste/ /bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra de yi/ /tshe tshad lo yang brgya phrag drug cur gyur/ /de yi pha rol sangs rgyas
gzhan byung ba/ /mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo yi shes dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu gnyis so/ /ye shes dbang
phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag drug cu bdun/ /gzi brjid dbang
phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi /tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang / /blo gros dbang
phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi /tshe yi tshad ni lo khri bzhi stong gyur/ /tshangs pa'i
dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /me yi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo me yi dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gyur/ /me yi dbang phyug
pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi/ /tshe yi tshad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur/ /tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha
rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi /tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshang / /tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha
rol sangs rgyas ni/ /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi /tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshang / /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug
pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshang / /dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol

sangs rgyas ni/ /zla ba'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyi ni/ /tshe yi tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur/ /zla ba'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /nyi ma'i

zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag bco brgyad do/ /nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i
rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang / /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa'i snyan
pa zhes bya rgyal ba byung / /rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi/ /tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyad gyur/ /bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang / /'jig rten rnam
par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung / /zil gyis mi non de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyi mnyan par gyis/ /mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i
dbyangs/ /rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags sgra/ /sgra skad rnam grags sgra dbyangs mchod pa dang / /dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' dang dbyangs dag dang / /ye shes
stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro /zil gyis ma non ye shes yang dag 'phags/ /ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags/ /ye shes rnam grangs de bzhin ye shes
dpa'/ /tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog /tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang spyan/ /tshangs
pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin/ /gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog /gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags/ /gzi brjid khyab dang
gzi brjid shin tu nges/ /gzi brjid sgra dbyangs shin tu rnam grags gzi/ /'jigs btsan stobs dang 'jigs btsan blo gros dang / /shin tu 'jigs btsan 'jigs zhal 'jigs
btsan 'phags/ /'jigs btsan 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs/ /'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung / /sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang / /rnam dag
sgra yi dbang phyug tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs/ /bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams skrag byed dang / /spyan bzang dang ni zhal gtsang spyan
dag dang / /rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mtha' yas spyan/ /kun nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyan/ /spyan gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad spyan/ /dul mchog dul dang shin
tu dul ba'i sems/ /dul rab zhi ba'i dbang po zhi ba'i yid/ /zhi ba'i bla ma zhi dpal rab tu zhi/ /zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'/ /bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems/ /
shin tu dul dang zhi dbang zhi ba'i yid/ /zhi ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba/ /zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'/ /tshogs dbang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / /
tshogs rnams zil gnon tshogs bzang ye shes gtsang / /tshogs kyi dbang chen tshogs dbang dpa' bo dang / /gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab rtu rnam pa 'byed/ /chos kyi rgyal
mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog /chos kyi bram chos kyi rang bzhin 'phags/ /chos kyi stobs ldan chos bzang dpa' bo dang / /rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa
byung | |rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni/ /mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad cu ste/ /bskal pa gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung / /byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod
de| |rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing / /thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na/ /de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob
'gyur// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i
le'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgya cher rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol na/ /bskal pa bsam yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe/ /lha mis mchod
pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung / /de yi mtshan ni mi dbang dbyangs zhes bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyi ni/ /tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong ste/ /nyan
thos dag ni bye ba brgya phrag gsum/ /de yi 'dus pa dang por gyur pa yin/ /mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul/ /mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ /
zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/ /'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung / /bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung ste/ /blo gros zab
cing grags pa shin tu che/ /mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur/ /mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan/ /stong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud/ /zhing ni bye bar de

las lhag par yang / /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro /rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas ni/ /phyir yang rgyal pa de yi drung du 'ong / /mdo sde sgrub pa'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas/ /snang
bar gyur pa sa yi steng na rgyu/ /sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po mthu chen ni/ /'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi byed de/ /de dag la ni lha yang
smon pa skyed/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer/ /mnyam gzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul can/ /rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa/ /dri ma med
bar rtag tu tshangs par spyod/ /tshig kyang rgyun mi chad cing spobs par ldan/ /nges tshig bstan pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas/ /sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston/ /dge ba'i
las rnams kyis kyang yongs su bzung / /bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags/ /'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bstod cing bsngags/ /rnam par thar dang don tshig yang
dag ston/ /tshul khrims shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med/ /chu yis pad+ma bzhin du mi chags te/ /khams gsum las ni rnam grol bag yod pa/ /'jig
rten chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing / /lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongs su dag /'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mthu yang che/ /chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon tan
gnas/ /sems can kun gyi rten dang dbung gnyen te/ /tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed/ /gang la gnas pa de nyid gzhan la ston/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang
yongs su bzung / /rgyal ba rnams kyi mjed 'dzin thugs brtan pa/ /khams gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid/ /rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad/ /'jig
rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas/ /mdo sde bye ba phrag stong 'chad par byed/ /'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam
spangs te/ /stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam ston/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan/ /gzhon nu bskal pa bye
ba mang por ni/ /rgyun chad med par bsngags par brjod kyang / /de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin/ /de tshe mi yi dbang
po'i dbyangs de ni/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di ston te/ /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang / /lha dang klu rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur/ /de yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di
bshad tshe/ /sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha dang mi rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldog gnas/ /der yang mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni/ /dpal gyi stobs
zhes bya ba mthu che ba/ /de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug /rgyal po de yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni/ /bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu
yod| |sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang / /bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang pa byung / /de yang ston zla tha chung nya ba la/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung nas ni/ /bye ba khrag
khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag btsal te/ /rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug /rgyal po de yi lhag
pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas/ /rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du kun spangs te/ /gnyen
dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas/ /rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung / /bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste/ /de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang / /gnyen bshes
rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang / /bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung / /bu dang chung mar bcas pa rab byung nas/ kha zas sgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas
ni| |rgyun ma chad par lo brgyad bar du bcags/ /'chag cing 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas/ /rgyal po'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de/ /rtag par rab tu mnyam
gzhag dus byas pas/ /de'ang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te/ /mngal gyi dri mas ma gos brdzus te byung / /de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs zhes bya/ /blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur
te| |gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu tshig smra ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam ge /'jig rten mgon pos bdag gi sems mkhyen nas/ /de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i
ting 'dzin bshad/ /rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba yang / /srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang / /mdo sde bye ba
khrag khrig byung ba dag /byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla med pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin ngag gtsang ba/ /sems
gtsang de bzhin lta ba gtsang ma dang / /dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'da' ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /chud mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan
pa| |lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan sgom pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs dang phrad cing shes rab rno/ /bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa/ /phung po yongs shes khams rnams
mnyam pa nyid/ /skye mched rnam pa kun tu bsal ba ste/ /skye ba med pa mngon sum 'jug pa dag /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la 'jug /yi ge
thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang / /dngos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /dbyangs rnams yongs su shes shing dga' ba thob/ /bde
gshegs bsngags pa la'ang dgar gyur cing / /'phags pa dag gi tshul 'jam drang po yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /des pa nam yang khro gnyer mi byed cing / /
mnyen zhing 'jam pa bzhin yang 'dzum pa ste/ /sems can mthong nas sngon du smra ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /le lo med cing bla ma'i ri mo byed/ /srid zhu che
bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lta/ /skye ba dag gis chog shes dkar ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgen gnas dang / /sbyangs pa dag la
gnas shing dran mi nyams/ /phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /skye mched mkhas shing mngon shes ye shes dang / /nyon mongs bsal
ba dul ba'i sa rnams dang / /gsang sngags mang po thams cad 'chad pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba kun las 'da' ba
dang | |skye ba dran zhing chos la ne ma nur med/ /chos la sems shing thos pa 'tshol ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /khyad par 'gro zhing rtag tu sgom la 'jug /ltung
ba dag la mkhas shing 'byung bar gnas/ /de la gnas pas bag la nyal ba sel/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /gang las ye shes rno ba'i mchog 'byung ba/ /mi
g.yo ri bo bzhin du mi sgul ba/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yongs 'tshol zhing / /
sdig pa'i chos rnams khor mor rnam par spong / /rtag tu nyon mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba med/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /bslab pa kun la rtogs par khong
du chud/ /mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtogs par rig /sems can dag gi bsam pa shes pas skul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston/ /khyad par shes pa
skye ba shes pa dang / /mtha' yas shes pa shin tu rdzogs par shes/ /'gro ba kun du mtshams sbyor shes pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /khyim gyi
gnas spangs rab tu 'byung ba'i sems/ /khams gsum la yang mi dga' mi 'dzin cing / /sems rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dag 'byed pa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /
skyob pa chos rnams la yang ma chags shing / /rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongs su 'dzin/ /las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /
'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes/ /de bzhin 'thab cing rtsod pa nye bar zhi/ /'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med pa'i sa/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /bzod
pa yang dag 'dzin cing khro med gnas/ /chos la rnam par nges shing rtag tu mkhas/ /tshig rnams rab tu 'byed la ye shes mthong / /thugs rje bskyed nas chos rnams ston pa
mdzad/ /sngon gyi mtha' shes phyi ma'i mtha' shes te/ /bde gshegs bstan las dus gsum mnyam pa nyid/ /'khor gsum dag ni yongs su chad par gsungs/ /rgyal ba chos
kyi bdag po de skad ston/ /sems kyang rab tu gnas shing rtse gcig dang / /lus kyang rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa/ /spyod lam dag kyang rtag tu bsrung ba yi/ /chos ni
skyes bu byu mchog thub pa ston/ /khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang / /'jig rten shes pa rigs pa'i tshigs rnams gsung / /chos rnams 'byung ba srog chags rang bzhin
dang | |byang chub dam pa mchog gi chos kyang ston/ /rjes su phan gdags pa dang khrel yod dang / /mi dge ba yi sems la smod pa dang / /sbyangs pa rjes su
mi gtong bsod snyoms spyod/ /chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /khrel yod po che shes pa rtag tu spyod/ /bla ma la yang gus smra ldang ba dang / /thog ma nyid nas
nga rgyal tshar bcad par/ /chos rnams rgyal ba chos rje de ltar ston/ /sems ni ldang ba nas kyang sems dge ste/ /ye shes khong du chud cing rtogs par byed/ /mi shes phyogs
rnams rtag tu rnam par spong / /byang chub mchog gi chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /sems la 'jug pa dang ni sgra shes pa/ /nges pa'i tshig la 'jug cing don rtogs dang / /gnod pa
thams cad rtag tu rnam spang bar/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de ltar ston/ /skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag bsten/ /skyes bu ngan pa dag ni rnam par spang / /rgyal ba la yang rtag
tu dad cing dga'/ /chos mchog rgyal pa de ltar ston pa mdzad/ /btags pa dang ni brda dang tha snyad dang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams ni rtag par spang / /rnyed dang ma rnyed pa
la zhum pa med/ /chos kyi dam pa rgyal bas de ltar bstan/ /bkur sti rnyed kyang mtshar du mi bzung zhing / /bkur sti ma byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag /yang dag bsngags pas
nam yang rlom sems med/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /gshe zhing smod pa thams cad bzod par bya/ /khyim pa kun dang lhan cig mi bsten cing / /rab tu byung ba dang
yang 'grogs mi bya/ /rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston/ /spyod yul ma yin thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas/ /spyod pa phun sum tshogs
shing dul ba'i sems/ /chos kyi tshul 'di bde bar gshegs pas bshad/ /byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam par spang / /rigs sun pa yang thams cad spang bar bya/ /sangs
rgyas bstan pa rtag par yongs su bsrung / /chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston/ /smra ba nyung zhing rab tu 'brel la snyan/ /gzhan dag la yang tshig 'jam dge bar smra/ /phas kyi
rgol ba chos dang ldan pas 'dul/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dus su 'gro ste dus la ma bab min/ /so so'i skye bo kun la yid mi brtan/ /sdug bsngal reg kyang yi mug
med par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dbul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na brtse ba bskyed/ /phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams
par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /chos kyi sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / /'jig rten zang zing rtag tu gtang bar bya/ /bsags par mi bya srung bar mi
bya ste/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /tshul khrims bsngags shing tshul khrims 'chal pa smad/ /g.yo sgyu med cing tshul khrims ldan la bsten//
nor la mi gnas bdog pa thams cad gtong / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma gnyer ba dang / /ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya/ /
chos smra ba yang mi chad bsten par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /ri mor bcas shing rtag tu yid dgar bya/ /zhi ba'i lta bas khor mor gnas par bya/ /sngon
spyod rnams la rtag par shin tu nges/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /dge ba'i spyod par rtag tu sngon du 'gro /'du shes bzlog dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang / /
mtshan ma spang ba la yang thabs mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mdo sde sgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / /bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon mi za/ /
rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon du byed/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mgo gcig tu ni tshig rnams brjod par bya/ /ji lta bzhin du mthong zhes rtogs par
mkhas/ /rtag tu tshig la the tshom med par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang rtag tu bsten/ /'jigs pa med cing tshul khrims stobs
la gnas/ /ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /shes kyi khe 'dod phyir ni yong mi bstan/ /sems kyang gya gyu can du mi bya
ste| |lta bar byas pa thams cad rnam par spang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /spobs pa mchog dang gzugs kyang dam pa ste/ /ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha'
ma med/ /gsang sngags byin rlabs rigs par spobs pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /lam 'di sgom bdag ni tshul gyi sgo/ /bstan pa 'di la spyad nas nan
tan dang / /tshul dang gdams pa rjes su bstan pa bzang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags/ /bzod la gnas pas
nyes pa rnam par spang / /ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes spang / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /ye shes rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byor sa/ /byang chub zhugs pa'i
rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste/ /skyes bu dam pa rtag par bsten pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /mi rigs brtson pa 'khor mor rnam par spang / /sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin
gshegs pas bshad/ /mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba/ /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste/ /'di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma
yin| |byang chub sems dpa' dag gis rtag tu bzung / /rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'brang / /lha rnams kyis
kyang mchod cing ri mor byas/ /tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba ston mdzad dam/ /nam mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci/ /klu yang stong gis rtag
tu phyag byas pa/ /byang chub dam pa rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ /shin tu mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thob ste/ /nor mchog dam pa yang
ni legs par rnyed/ /zang zing med pa'i ye shes gso ba mchog /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba bshad mdzad dam/ /ye shes mdzod yin spobs pa mi zad pa/ /'di ni mdo sde bye bar
'jug pa ste/ /khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi/ /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba bshad mdzad dam/ /gang la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /'di ni pha rol 'gro
ba'i gzings su bstan/ /'di ni chu bo rgal ba'i gru yin te/ 'di ni snyan grags bsngags phreng 'phel bar byed/ /gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams la bstod pa yin/ /skyes bu khyu mchog la yang bsngags pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mi zad yon tan tshul/ /gang dag la ni ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/ /'di
ni zhe sdang zhe bar byams pa bstan/ /'di ni snying rje can gyi btang snyoms sa/ /'di ni grags pa chen po'i dbugs 'byin pa/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs rnams kyi nan tan te/ /'di las sangs
rgyas/ ye shes mchog kyang 'byung / /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dren bdag gis bshad/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba rgyal bas bshad pa 'di/ /thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed/ /'di ni byang chub rab zhugs spyod pa ste/ /bdud kyi sde rnams shin tu skrag par byed/ /rgyal bas ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /skyob pa chos la
gnas pa'i rig sngags 'di/ /dgra yi nang du srung ba dam pa ste/ /phas kyi rgol ba chos kyis tshar gcod pa/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten byas na/ /'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang
rab tu bstan/ /stobs dang rnam thar de bzhin dbang po dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams bco brgyad bye brag 'phags/ /stobs bcu rnams kyang yongs su 'tshol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas
ye shes kyi yang snga ltas so/ /skyes mchog 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse bas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'ang yin/ /sangs rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'di bzung ste/ /
'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam du bstan/ ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di thos nas/ /de la bde gshegs sras po dga' bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su rdzogs
pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'tshol ba 'di/ /rnam dag sems gtsang nyon mongs med pa yis/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis/ /
rgyal ba bzhin du de yi lus dag ste/ /rna par thar dang ye shes rnam grol mthong / /'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi mongs/ /ting 'dzin bzang po 'di la brten par gyis/
zhe sdang sa min gti mur bral ba ste/ /bde ba 'dod pa'i ye shes 'byung ba yin/ /rig ba skye zhing ma rig 'jig pa ste/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis/ /rnam grol
snying por byed pa ngoms par bshad/ /bsam gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhi 'di bstan/ /sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi spyan yin te/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis/ /'di
ni zhing mang ston pa'i mngon par shes/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ /ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la/ /gzungs de rnams kyang rnyed par dka' mi
'gyur/ /byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas/ /'di ni byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bsnyen par byed pa yi/ /ye shes phra zhing yangs pa rnam par
dag| gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ma thos/ /mi rig brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bzlog pa ste/ /dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus ma yin/ /
byang chub sems dpa' rig pas 'di shes te/ /chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa/ /ting 'dzin 'di la brten par byed pa yi/ /zhi ba dag dang smad pa med pas rtogs/ /brtson 'grus brtsams
pas rab tu 'di bzung ste/ /bsnyen bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs/ /ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen par byed pa ni/ /sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shes/ /chos rnams kun gyi
skye ba med pa bstan/ /de ltar srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas grags chen dag gis ye shes mchog /ting 'dzin de ni rgyal pas bshad mdzad dam/ /gzhon nu de yis tshigs
bcad 'di thos nas/ /khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad rnams/ /dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bzod pa der thob ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes las ni mi ldog gnas/ /brtan pa'i stobs
kyis gzhon nu de la smras/ /da dung 'jig rten mgon po de bzhugs so/ /khye'u khyod la don 'di dri bar bya/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos/ /gzhon nus smras pa rgyal po
gsan du gsol/ /bdag gis bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig mthongs te ri mor bgyis/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bdag gis dris/ /gzhan yang bskal pa dgu
bcu rtsa dgu dang / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong du/ /de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur/ /nam yang mngal du skyes par ma gyur to/ /de nas bdag gis ting 'dzin 'di
bsgoms te/ /rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa dag par thos/ /thos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de/ /ne ma nur med pas byang chub reg par bgyi/ /dge slong
su dag bdag la kun 'dri zhing / /ting 'dzin 'di la yongs su chud bgyid pa/ /de la bdag ni gus par ri mor bgyid/ /'jig rten don mdzad dag la bgyis bzhin/ /su las
bdag gis tshigs bcad gcig tsam yang / /lung mnos rjes mthun spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /de dag la yang bdag ni ston pa snyam/ /sangs rgyas bzhin du gus pas ri mo bgyid//
ting 'dzin yongs su chub par bgyid pa 'di/ /su dag la la bdag la 'dri ba yang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rgyal bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rmi lam na yang bdag la the tshom med/ /
dge slong rgan rabs bar ma gzhon nu la/ /bdag ni ri mo gus dang ldan bar bgyid/ /ri mor ldan pas bdag gi snyan pa dang / /de bzhin bsod nams grags pa yon tan
'phel/ /'thab cing rtsod pa dag la brtson mi bgyid/ /de tshe bdag ni brtson pa chung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur/ /dge ba bgyis pas 'gro ba
gzhan du 'gyur/ /mi rigs brtson par sbyor zhing ma bsngags pa/ /de dag gi ni mi snyan tshig thos nas/ /de tshe bdag gir bgyi ba las su 'dzin/ /las rnams bgyis pa rnam
par chud mi za/ /de la khro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i bzod pa'i stobs 'dzin te/ /'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bzod pa bsngags/ /bzod pa bsgoms pa byang chub
rnyed mi dka'/ /bdag kyang rtag tu tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims la yang gzhan dag rab tu 'god/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa rtag tu bdag brjod de/ /de na bdag
gi tshig kyang btsun par gyur/ /dgon pa'i bsngags pa dag kyang rtag tu brjod/ /tshul khrims la ni rtog bar rab gnas te/ /rtag tu gso sbyong dag kyang 'dzin du stsal/ /de dag
byang chub la yang yang dag btsud/ /de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag bstabs/ /chos dang don rnams la yang rab tu gnas/ /gang la mtha' dang chags pa 'di med pa/ /byang
chub lam la de dag sad par bgyis/ /bdag dran bskal pa 'das pa'i dus shig na/ /rgyal ba sgra yi yan lag dbyangs byung ste/ /de yi spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa/
bdag ni rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs ldan bgyi/ /yi dam bcas pa de la gnas nas ni/ /lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu phrag bzhir yang / /bdag la bdud kyis shin tu smad cing
spyos/ /'on kyang bdag gi sems ni yong ma 'khrugs/ /der ni bdud kyis bgam zhing sad na yang / /bdag gi byams bzod brtan par 'tshal nas ni/ /sems dang
bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ /lnga brgya byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /bdag ni rtag tu ser sna med par gyur/ /gtong ba'i bsngags pa dag kyang khor
mor 'chad/ /phyug cing nor ldan bdag nyid chen bor gyur/ /mu ge'i tshe yang bdag nyid sbyin bdag gyur/ /dge slong su dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin cing / /su dag klog cing su dag
lung nod pa/ /de dag la ni bdag kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid/ /de dag thams cad mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdag ni bla na med pa'i las de yis/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po
mang po mthong / /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang rab byung ste/ /rtag tu chos smra ba ni mkhas par gyur/ /sbyangs pa la yang rtag tu bdag brtson te/ /bas mtha' dgon pa la yang 'khor mor
gnas/ /kha zas phyir ni tshul 'chos mi bgyid de/ /ngan ngon tsam dag gis kyang chog shes gyur/ /bdag ni rtag tu phrag dog ma mchis te/ /bdag ni khyim la'ang chags par mi
'gyur ro/ /khyim la chags pa dag ni phrag dog skye/ /phrag dog ma mchis nags dgon dpa' bar bgyid/ /bdag ni rtag tu byams la gnas par gyur/ /gshe zhing sdigs
kyang khro ba mi skyed de/ /byams pa la yang gnas pa des pas yi/ /snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bzhir rab tu mched/ /rtag tu cho ga shes 'dod pa nyung bar gyur/ /dgon par gnas
shing sbyangs pa'i yon tan brtson/ /bsod snyoms len bdag kyang mi gtong ste/ /sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par gyur/ /rtag tu dang bar bcas shing dad par gyur/ /khor mor
sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa mang / /dad pa mang pa'i phan yon 'di lags te/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing dbang po mnyams gyur/ /gang dag 'chad pa de la bdag gnas te/ /bdag ni
rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid/ /nan tan snying por bgyid la lha klu yang / /rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis ri mor bgyid/ /yon tan ji snyed brjod pa 'di dag dang / /gzhan yang
rnam pa du ma mang po yod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa/ /mkhas pa 'di dag rtag tu bslab par bgyid/ /'di bas ches mang dka' ba spyad pa ni/ /sngon gyi
bskal pa du mar mang spyad dran/ /da ltar de dag brjod par mi nus kyi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du da mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rno mkhas des/ /de yi mod
la mngon shes lnga thob nas/ /de yang srog chags bye ba brgyad cu dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rgyal ba'i drung du song / /brtan pa'i stobs kyang mchog tu dga' rangs nas/ /de tshe bye ba
brgya phrag drug cu dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer lhags te/ /zhabs la phyag btsal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /rkang gnyis
dbang pos ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/ /rgyal po des kyang ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /rgyal srid btang ste ma chags rab tu byung / /rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin
