'di la sgom/ /klog cing 'chad de rab tu ston par byed/ /bskal pa drug cu 'das pa'i 'og tu de/ /pad+ma bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar gyur/ /rgyal po lhan cig rgyal ba'i drung 'ong ba/ /
bye ba brgya phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/ /de dag kyang ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /de tshe dga' zhing mgu bas rab tu byung / /de dag rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di/ /bzung zing bklags
te rab tu ston par byed/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu 'das nas ni/ /bskal pa gcig la byang chub mchog reg ste/ /mtshan ni ye shes bla ma mtha' yas pa/ /lha mis
mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams su gyur/ /de la rkang gnyis gtso bo re res kyang / /sems can gang+gA'i bye snyed grol bar byas/ /byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na/ /nga ni rgyal
po dpal gyi stobs su gyur/ /nga yi bu dag lnga brgya yod pa yang / /rjes su chos rnams skyong ba 'di dag yin/ /de tshe gang su nga yi mar gyur pa/ /de ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid
yin te/ /bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba yis/ /nga yi bu mo de kun mya ngan 'das/ /stobs brtan zhes bya rgyal po gang byung ba/ /rab tu mdzod mang 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i mchog/ de tshe rgyal po zas gtsang de yin te/ de dang der yang nga yi yab tu gyur/ /de ltar ngas ni bskal pa bye stong du/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa yis/ /byang chub
mchog 'di yang dag sgrub pa na/ /ting 'dzin yongs su 'tshol ba rnam par dag /gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /ting 'dzin 'di la sgom par 'dod pa dag /brtson 'grus
brtsams shing srog la mi lta bar/ /gzhon nu rtag par nga yi rjes su slobs/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa
dang | kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cer rab tu ston pa de la yon tan
gyi phan yon bzhir rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams zil gyis mi non par 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ ye shes dpag
tu med par 'gyur/ spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par
byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'dod pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan
gyi phan yon 'di bzhi yod par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/ /ting 'dzin zhi
ba 'di bzung na/ /rtag pa'i dus su bsod nams kyang / /shin tu zil gyis mi non 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa bye brag 'phags/ /mchog tu dag pa spyod pa na/ /dpa' bo rtag pa'i
dus su yang / /bsod nams dag gis bsrungs par 'gyur/ /de la phas kyi rgol ba dag /su yang 'tshe bar yongs mi byed/ /rtag pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyis/ /yongs su bzung
bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag pa'i dus su ye shes kyang / /dpag tu med par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhi ba'i rten 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi
ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /rtag tu bsod nams phung po zil mi no/ /byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na/ phas kyi rgol ba med cing mi tshugs 'gyur/ /de yi ye shes yangs
shing rno bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/ /mig kyang dag 'gyur rtag tu mkhas pa de/ /dran pa'i stobs dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang 'byung / /don
gyi tshig rnams rab tu ston byed na/ /mkhas pa dag gi shin tu yid 'ong 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni rab bshad na/ /shes rab ldan pa skye bo mang pos rig /ting 'dzin zhi ba
mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /chos gos dam pa mchog dang mal cha dang / /mgron dug nyer dang bza' zhing bca' ba'ang rnyed/ /shin tu gzhon zhing blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
zhi ba mchog 'di 'tshol ba na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong / /'dren pa dag la mtshungs med mchod pa byed/ /de la bar chad dag kyang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /sems dga' tshigs bcad snyan pa brgya dag gis/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar bstod 'gyur te/ /de ni nyams par nam yang yong mi 'gyur/ /ting
'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /de yi mdun du 'jig rten mgon po ni/ /mtshan dang dpe byad mdzes pa'i sku bzhugs te/ /de yi ye shes nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /nam yang zhum pa'i sems su mi 'gyur te/ /rtag tu phyug cing dbul po ma yin 'gyur/ /sems kyang 'dzin cing chags par yong mi 'gyur/ /ting
'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/ /mi khom par yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/ /sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de yi rgyal srid rtag tu bde bar 'ong /
bskal pa brgyar ni bshad kyang mi zad de/ /ye shes yangs pa de la the tshom med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i sa 'di thos nas ni/ /brtan pa ji ltar brtan pa de bzhin
gnas/ /bskal pa bye la mtha' yas dpag med du/ /stobs bcus de yi phan yon brjod na yang / /cha tsam du ni mongs su brjod mi 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs blangs pa
bzhin/ /de tshe gzhon nu de yang rab dga' pas/ /langs nas rab tu thal sbyar phyag btsal te/ /mgu rangs stobs bcu yi ni mngon sum 'dug/ tshig rab mchog gis ched
du rjod pa brjod/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /mi gtsos 'di dag ji tsam du/ /phan yon legs par rab bshad pa/ /dpa' bo chen po bsam mi khyab/ /phyi ma'i dus
na su dag ni/ /mdo sde 'di la nyan par 'gyur/ /phan par dgongs shing thugs brtse ba/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsungs/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /ston pas
de la bshad mdzad de/ /bcom ldan chags med ye shes can/ /tshig kyang 'di skad rab tu gsung / /su dag chos kyi rjes slob cing / /mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'gyur ba/ /nan tan
bla na med pa yang / /gzhon nu bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab 'tshol bas/ /mi dbang dag la mchod byed cing / /byams pa'i sems la snyen byed
pa/ |mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs/ /yon tan mchog la bsnyen byas shing / /nan tan la yang gnas nas su/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan par
'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa la/ /gang gis tshul khrims bshig pa dang / /sdig pa byed pa'i la gnas ni/ /mdo sde 'di yang thos mi 'gyur/ /dpa' bo tshangs par
spyod pa dang / /gang gi sems kyang mi brkam zhing / /sangs rgyas dag gis byin brlabs pa/ /de dag la gnas thos par 'gyur/ /gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag /'jig rten
mgon po ri mor byas/ /de dag lag nas mdo sde 'di/ /phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur/ /gang dag tshe rabs snga ma la/ /mu stegs can du gyur ba ni/ /de dag mdo sde 'di thos na/ /
yid ni dga' zhing bder mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni/ /'tsho ba 'dod phyir rab byung nas/ /rnyed dang bkur stis zil gyis non/ /gcig la gcig kyang smod par byed/ /
dge slong dbang po ma bsdams pa/ /gzhan gyi bud med rab snyegs shing / /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnyed pa 'dod/ /mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/ /sangs rgyas brnyes pa'i bsod
nams dang / /bsam gtan thob par mi 'dod cing / /bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa dag /mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni/ /'jig rten bsam gtan
'bras bur 'dzin/ /dgra bcom bsod snyoms zos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub smod par byed/ /dzam+bu yi ni gling 'di ni/ /mchod rten ci yod kun
bshig pas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/ /sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/ /gang gis gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /dgra bcom dag ni bsad pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs
na| |sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/ /mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad par/ /khyed la su dag spro ba yod/ /de tshe gzhon nu
langs nas ni/ /du zhing rgyal la 'di skad gsol/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyi sras po yis/ /'di skad seng ge'i sgra yang bsgrags/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/ /
mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/ /lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/ /bdag gis mdo sde rgyas par bgyi/ /byis pa rnams kyi mi bden pa/ /brgyad cing spyos pa bzod par bgyi/ /
gshe ba dang ni sdigs pa yang / /'dren pa dang du blang bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la/ /ngan sems dag ni bskyed pa'am/ /gang sngon bdag gis
sdig pa yi/ /las rnams bgyis pa byang bar bgyi/ /spyi bo la ni phyag bzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/
zla 'od la ni ston pa gsung / /gzhon nu phyi ma'i dus dag la/ /khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa dang / /srog gi bar chad mi 'byung bar/ /khyod la byin gyis brlab par bya/ /chos smra ba na
gzhan dag kyang / /brgyad brgya po dag langs nas ni/ /phyi ma'i dus la bdag cag kyang / /mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa lags/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang / /bye ba brgyad cu nyer lhags
te| |gzhan yang khrag khrig drug cu rnams/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad smra/ /dge slong dag ni 'di rnams las/ /de ring su dag langs pa rnams/ /phyi dus de tshe bdag cag gis/ /
'dren pa rab tu bsrung bar bgyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe/ /ston pa yi ni byin rlabs kyis/ /gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /zhir rnams
ji snyed rab g.yos pas/ kun tu sangs rgyas sprul pa dag /'jig rten mgon pos rab bkye ste/ /de dag gis kyang chos rab bstan/ /zhing de so so re rer yang / /sems can bye ba
bsam mi khyab/ /de tshe de 'dra'i chos thos nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes bkod/ /sangs rgyas kyi yang zhing 'di nas/ /sems can bye ba dgu bcu rnams/ /byang chub kyi ni
sems bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas la yang me tog 'thor/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu na/ /bskal pa gcig la thams cad kyang / /rnam par 'dren pa nyid 'gyur zhes/ /de dag mi
gtsos lung bstan to/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen pa dang dge bsnyen ma/ /srog chags bye ba bdun cu drug /gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa/ /
de dag mi gtsos lung bstan te/ /byang chub spyod par bskyod cing / /gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab 'tshol bas/
thams cad la yang mchod pa byed/ /mdo sde bla na med pa 'di/ /de dang der yang thos par 'gyur/ /byams pa yi ni sangs rgyas la/ /bla na med pa'i mchod byas te/ /dam pa'i
chos mchog bzung nas ni/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang na sangs rgyas rdul bral ba/ /tshe dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs/ /de la byang chub mchog gi phyir/ /mchod
pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di thos nas/ /ma 'ongs pa yi bskal pa ni/ /grangs med bdun cu rtsa gsum du/ /ngan 'gro rnams su yong mi 'gro/ /phyi ma'i dus
la su dag ni/ /mdo sde dam pa nyan 'gyur zhing / /'chang ngam klog par byed pa yang / /de dag kun gyis nga la mchod/ /ji snyed mdun na 'dug pa rnams/ /thams cad la yang
bsgo bya ste/ /ngas ni dka' bas thos pa yi/ /byang chub 'di yang yongs su gtad/ /ting nge 'dzin rjes su gtad pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang
bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa thos nas mi skrag par 'dod pa dang / mi dngang bar 'dod
pa dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par
bya'o| |sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dri ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su btsal ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi skrag /mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ji lta bur na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur
ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu| byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang
ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas sgom par byed pa dang / mang du byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
ston na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na
mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i
tshig 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la nges par bstan pa na/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i
ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das las thos nas/ de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur bas chos thams
cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa'ang mngon
par shes pa chen po thob par gyur to/ /sems can dpag tu med pa'ang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skyes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab
tu ldeg /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur
'ur| shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ mtha'
dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho zhing / snang ba dpag tu med pa'ang 'jig rten du byung / lha'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab bo/
lha dang lha'i bu ji snyed chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te lhags pa de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge
'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes
nas a la la zhes gzhan sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do/ /lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so/ /lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rab tu rdung ngo /
brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /a la la/ bdag cag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon
tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag thams cad kyang gcig car mthun par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
thams cad kyis kyang chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyi'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das 'khor rgya mtsho'i
nang na chos ston pa la/ dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can zhes bya ba rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sil snyan lnga brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar 'dug go /de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang
na ji lta ba bzhin du rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /glu dbyangs dag ji ltar len pa de bzhin du deng lha'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
la'ang mchod pa'i phyir glu dbyangs rab tu sbyar ro/ /de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can sil snyan thogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang sgra gcig tu sbyar te/ pi wang gi khog pa baiDUR+ya las
byas pa dag kyang thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'dus
byas pas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa thob pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam
par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang / dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can la'ang rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra la mkhas pa bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ngas bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan lnga brgya
po shin tu legs par sbyar pa/ legs par blangs pa de dag las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i sgra byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / /skra gcig khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ci yod snyed/ /rgyal ba de dag
zhing yang de snyed de/ /de dag mtshan nyid mi 'dra skal mi mnyam/ /skra yi khyon la 'gro ba lnga rnams te/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror 'gro ba dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig
rten lha dang mi rnams zhugs/ /'dres pa med cing gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med/ /de yi gnas su mtsho dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /chu klung de bzhin mtshe'u dang lteng ka rnams//
'dres pa med cing gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /de yi gnas su ri bo du ma ste/ /khor yug dang ni lhun po rab lhun dang / /btang zung dang ni
btang bzung chen po dang / /'bigs byed bya rgod phung po gangs kyi ri/ /gnas der sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa/ /tsha dang rab tu tsha ba nyams mi dga'/ /de na sems can dmyal skyes tshor
ba yi| |sdug bsngal de dag rjes su myong bar byed/ /de yi gnas na lha yi gzhal med khang / /de dag dpag tshad bcu gnyis dbyangs dga' ba/ /lha rnams stong phrag mang po de dag kyang / /lha
yi dga' ba shin tu bde ba myong / /de yi gnas su sangs rgyas rnams skye zhing / /'jig rten rig pa'i bstan pa 'bar ba snang / /gang gis rnam dag spyod pa ma sbyangs pa/ /ye shes bral ba
dag gis de mi mthong / /de yi gnas nyid na yang chos nub cing / /'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang thos/ /de yi gnas nyid na yang la la yis/ /'dren pa bzhugs te chos kyang ston
ces thos/ /de yi gnas nyid na yang la la dag /tshe tshad lo ni bsam yas bzhugs snyam 'dzin/ /de yi gnas na'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / /ring du mi 'tsho zhes ni sgra yang thos//
gnas der la la 'di snyam 'du shes te/ /yid kyi 'du shes dang ni 'dzin pa yis/ /bde gshegs mthong mchod sangs rgyas mnyes byas snyam/ /skyes pa med cing mchod pa byas
pa'ang med/ /mi dag bdag gi khyim na rmi lam bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' myong nas/ /phyir sad nas kyang de yis gdod ma mthong / /de ni rmi lam yin par de
yis shes/ /de bzhin mthong thos rig dang bye brag byed/ /'di dag thams cad mi bden rmi lam bzhin/ /gang gis ting 'dzin 'di yang thob gyur pa/ /des
ni chos kyi rang bzhin 'di dag shes/ /su la'ang sdug dang mi sdug med pa ni/ /mi de 'jig rten na yang bde skyid rtag /su dag nags khrod mngon par dga' ba yi/ /dge sbyong de
ni shin tu bde ba myong / /su dag ci la'ang bdag gir bya ba med/ /yongs su 'dzin pa rnam pa kun tu spangs/ /bse ru bzhin du 'jig rten 'di na gnas/ /nam mkha' la ni rlung
dag rgyu ba bzhin/ /lam rnams bsgoms shing ye shes rab tu zhugs/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa bdag med par/ /chos rnams 'di dag gang gis rab bsgoms pa/ /
de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /su dag 'jig rten na ni yid chags med/ /de dag sems ni rtag tu rlung dang 'dra/ /sdug dang mi sdug la yang chags pa med/ /'jig
rten na ni mi de shin tu skyid/ /mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal te/ /sdug ba dang yang bral ba sdug bsngal yin/ /mthar byas 'di gnyis rab tu spangs nas ni/ /mi gang
chos la dga' ba de dag skyid/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos nas chags byed cing / /chos ma yin pa thos nas khong khro byed/ /nga rgyal rgyags pas bcom pa log pa de/ /nga rgyal
dbang gis sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /su dag mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas te/ /rtag tu khengs pa med cing 'dud pa med/ /sdug dang mi sdug pa las rab grol ba/ /de dag rtag tu grol
yid legs par gnas/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag par rab gnas te/ /bsam gtan bsam mi khyab pa la rtag gnas shing / /su dag nags khrod zhi bar dga' ba ni/ /de dag nam
yang yid gnyis yong mi 'gyur/ /mi bden pa la su dag rab zhugs shing / /byis pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rtag tu dga'/ /bya rgod dag ni ro la mos pa bzhin/ /de dag rtag par bdud kyi
dbang du 'gro /yang pi wang gi sgra de las tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byung nas zla 'od gzhon nur rgyur pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa zab mo nges par
rtogs pa la mkhas pa rjes su thob bo/ /dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can yang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi yi skye dgu sems can dpag tu med pa bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi'ang don byas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par
bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad gdon mi za zhing tshul khrims shin tu yongs su
dag par bya'o/ /'du 'dzin med pa mang zhing sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / chos
'tshol ba la brtson pa dang / chos la don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la
zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gzhon nu/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang / myur
du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsams shing lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya ste/ gang
snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag rgyun mi chad par yongs su btsal bar bya/ g.yo med pas bsnyen par bya/ bsten par
bya| rim gror bya ste/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag lhags pa'i bsam pas yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag las snying rje chen po la
'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa
med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gang las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la dga'
ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang /
g.yog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bde bar snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob bo/ /gzhon nu/ de lta bas na mgo dad gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du byas te rtag par dge ba'i
bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya/ g.yo med pas bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ rim gror bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khar las na/ snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
'di lta ci smos/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / g.yog bya ba la yid yongs su mi skyo bar bya'o zhes gzhon
nu khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur
gyur pa la sngon byung ba bstan pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /'das pa'i bskal ba bye ba mang po ste/ /dpag tu med cing gzhal
med bsam mi khyab/ /de tshe dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes/ /'dren pa rkang gnyis gtso bo byung bar gyur/ /des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad de/ /de la mi dang srog dang
gang zag med/ /sgyu ma chu bur smig rgyu glog 'dra zhing / /chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /shi nas 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba yi/ /sems can shed las skyes pa mi
dmigs kyang / /las rnams byas pa med par mi 'gyur te/ /dkar gnag ji bzhin 'bras bu smin par byed/ /rigs pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'di bzang po ste/ /phra zhing mthong dka' rgyal ba'i
spyod yul yin/ /gang la yi ge'i tshig kyang mi dmigs pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub nyid ni bcom ldan mkhyen/ /yangs pa'i gzungs dang ye shes bsags pa ste/ /mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig
rnams kyang 'byung / /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig spyod yul te/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bcom ldan rab tu 'chang / /'di ni na ba nad las thar byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpas bsgrubs pa'i
nor yin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab tu bsngags/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha yis rab tu mchod/ /skye bo byis pa kun la yang dag ston/ /mu stegs can gyis rtag par
yongs su spangs/ /tshul khrims nor ni mchog tu sangs rgyas gsungs/ /nam mkha' la ni glog bzhin chags mi 'gyur/ /gang gis rgyal ba bye ba rab mchod cing / /sbyin dang tshul
khrims spyad pa mkhas pa dang / /sngan chad sdig pa'i grogs po spangs pa dag /de dag gi ni bla med pha rol nor/ /de na dge slong chos smra 'dug pa dag /tshangs par spyod pa bde
gshegs thugs kyi sras/ /rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'di thos nas ni/ /'jig rten 'dren par sems kyang bskyed par gyur/ /'dren pa dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po yis/ /
chos smra de la yang ni tshig gsungs pa/ /dge slong dngos po mchog tu bya dka' yis/ /byang chub dam pa mchog la sems skyed cig /nor bu rin chen 'dra
par tshul khrims srungs/ /rjes su mthun pa'i grogs la rtag par sten/ /sdig pa'i grogs la nam yang ma bsten dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob/ /dbang po
tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i drung / /gang gis byang chub sems mchog bskyed pa ni/ /de dag thams cad chos smrar rab 'gyur te/ /tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs gyi
sras| |dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang /
yon tan gyi chos thams cad la gdon mi za bar bya'o/ /'du 'dzi mang ba ma yin par bya'o/ /sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa
dang | yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / chos yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson pa dang / chos la don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / chos
yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos dang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa la zhugs par bya'o/ /des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gang
las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la'ang des dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i
rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par blangs te gnas na de myur du spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa las nges par 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nem nur
dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom gyi mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang ba lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad nges
bar bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi rgyud tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sngon
byung dzam+bu'i gling zhes bya ba 'dir/ /g.yel ba med pa'i khye'u mchog gnyis byung ste/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la rab byung nas/ /bse ru bzhin du nags khrod stug por
gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bsam gtan bzhi rnams thob/ /snyan dngags bstan bcos mkhas shing rdzogs pa ste/ /bar snang gi ni rjes dang sa yang rig
de dag nam mkha' la yang thogs med 'gro /de dag nags khrod stug po bsil ba der/ /me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas gang / /bya yang sna tshogs mang pos bsnyen pa der/ /phan
tshun du ni gtam dag rab tu smra/ /rgyal po ri dwags 'chor zhing song song na/ /sgra grags nas ni nags tshal der 'ongs te/ /rgyal pos chos smra de gnyis mthong nas ni/ /de la mchog
tu dga' ba nye bar bzhag /de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam byas nas/ /de dag rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / /rgyal po de yi dmag mang mtha' yas pa/ /bye ba khrag
khrig drug cu nye bar lhags/ /de nas chos smra de dag so so nas/ /rgyal po de la smras pa rgyal rigs nyon/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog tu rnyed par dka'/ /sa yi bdag po rtag tu
bag yod gyis/ /tshe ni rtag tu 'gro zhing mi gnas te/ /ri yi chu bo bzhin du myur du 'gro /nad dang mya ngan rga bas gzir ba la/ /khyod la dge ba'i lam 'dra skyabs gzhan med/ /
rgyal po'i glang po chos rnams bskyang bar gyis/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i bstan pa 'di yang srungs/ /zad pa'i dus la shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi
phyogs gnas kyis/ /de ltar de tshe mkhas pa de dag gis/ /rnam pa du mar mi dbang gdams pa byas/ /rgyal po khrag khrig drug cur bcas pa yis/ /de tshe byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
do| |de tshe rgyal po'i glang po chos thos nas/ /des shing dge ba'i chos rnams smra ba la/ /rangs shing yid bde dga' ba rab skyes nas/ /rkang pa la yang phyag btsal de nas song / /rgyal
po de yi dge slong mang po dag /rnyed pa 'dod cing de yi khyim du 'jug /de dag de mi 'dra ba'i spyod mthong nas/ /de la rgyal po de ltar ri mo med/ /bstan pa de yang ston pa 'das pa yi
de tshe lo yi tha mar gyur pa ste/ /dzam+bu'i gling na snod gyur rab tu nyung / /ma bsdams pa dag shin tu mang po byung / /de nas dge slong mang po brkam zhing chags/ /rnyed pa 'dod cing dmigs
pa'i lta ba can/ /bde gshegs bstan pa rab tu zhig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po de yang bsgyur cing byed du bcug /chos smra gnyis po 'di ni gsad par gyis/ /'di dag mu stegs chad par smra
ba ste| |yun ring spyod par yang dag 'dzud byed kyang / /de dag gang du'ang mya ngan 'da' mi ston/ /las kyang 'jig cing rnam par smin pa 'jig /tshul 'chos 'di dag phung po med ces smra/
rgyal po 'di dag yul nas spangs nas ni/ /'dir yang chos ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gi ni tshig thos de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po the tshom byung bar gyur/ /chos smra
gnyis po 'di ni gsad par bya/ /btang snyoms bzhag na gnod par 'gyur srid snyam/ /rgyal po de phyir 'brang ba lha mo zhig /tshe rabs snga mar lhan cig spyod
pa spyad/ /yun ring dus nas phan 'dod mkhas pa ste/ /de yis rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal rigs sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig dag gis/ /'di lta bu yi sems ni ma
bskyed cig /dge slong chos smra mkhas pa gnyis po 'di/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig gis ma spongs shig /de dag gis ni nags khrod ci bshad pa/ /shin tu 'jigs pa mi
bzad dus kyi tshe/ /rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas kyis/ /mi yi bdag po cung zad mi dran nam/ /rgyal po yang dag tshig gis bskul ba yis/ /de ni rgyal po'i bstan pa mi
gtong gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po'i nub bo ma rungs pa/ /nyen gor rgyal po byed pa des rbad de/ /rgyal po khyod kyi gcen ni sdig pa can/ /bdag gi srog kyang nam du 'dod mi byed/ /dge
slong gnyis po rig sngags drag ldan pa/ /de dag nam mkha' la yang sngags kyis 'gro/ /de thos nas ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs/ /thams cad 'dus te gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ /rig
sngags drag ldan 'di gnyis myur du gsod/ /phyis gdod 'gyod par gyur na ma legs so/ /de tshe rgyal po'i glang po go bgos nas/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis der chas
te| |rgyal po dmag sde kun gyis yongs bskor nas/ /nags nas dge slong gang na yod par lhags/ /rgyal po mi zad drag shul sems rig nas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin nags der gnas
pa yis/ /rdo dang so phag char phab phyir bskrad de/ /des ni rgyal po sde dang bcas pa btags/ /ltos shig sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis ni/ /de tshe ma rungs rgyal po 'chi dus byas/ /
chos smra dag la khro ba byas bas na/ /der ni tshe rabs drug cur mnar med song / /rgyal rigs rgyal po gang gis rbad pa yi/ /dge slong dmigs lta mang po de dag kyang / /tshe rabs
bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas su/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /lha mo gang gis rgyal po bskul bstan cing / /gang gis chos smra de dag bsrungs pa ni/ /
sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa mthong / /spyad pa spyod cing de dag mchod pa byas/ /bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mtha' yas pas/ /rgyal po dang ni lhan cig chos thos shing / /byang
chub tu ni sems mchog bskyed pa dag /'jig rten khams mang du yang sangs rgyas gyur/ /de dag tshe tshad bskal ba byed ba mang / /de dag ye shes gzhal med bsam mi khyab/ /de
dag kun gyis ting 'dzin bzang po 'di/ /bshad nas rkang gnyis gtso bo mya ngan 'das/ /tshul khrims tshangs pa yon tan ye shes bsags/ /bla na med pa'i tshig 'di thos
nas ni/ /g.yeng ba med par bag yod spyod cig dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob/ /phyogs bcu dag gi de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams/ /sems zhi snying rje byams pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen mthong / /'jig rten kun tu chos kyi char 'bebs 'gyur/ /
gzhon nu khye'u mchog gnyis po byung ba yang / /gzhan yin snyam na de ltar mi blta ste/ /mar me mdzad ni de na gcig tu gyur/ /de tshe chos smra gnyis pa nga yin no/ /gang gis
rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ /rgyal po der yang byams pa de tshe gyur/ /lha mo phan 'dod mkhas pa gang byung ba/ /gzhon nu khyod ni de tshe der gyur to/ /rgyal po de yi nu bo gang
byung ba/ /dge slong chos smra 'di gnyis sod cig ces/ /dge slong rnyed ba 'dod pas rbad pa ni/ /lha sbyin de yi tshe na der gyur to/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu
gcig pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang
srog la ma chags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu/ lus dang srog la chags pa'i phyir sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang srog la ma chags pa rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta
ci smos/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na lus dang srog la'ang ma chags par bya'o zhes de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /rtag tu khor mor rnag gi lus
'di la/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu chags byed de/ /srog la 'du zhing bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ /mi mkhas pa dag rtag tu sdig pa byed/ /su dag snying po med pa'i lus srog la/ /
lhag par chags pa yod pa ma yin pa/ /de dag gis ni bdud kyi sde bcom ste/ /byang chub shing drung byang chub rab tu rtogs/ /su dag bdag med stong pa'i lus rnams dang / /srog
kyang rmi lam g.yo ba zil pa 'dra/ /'di gnyis la ni chags par byed 'gyur ba/ /de dag shi 'phos sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /lus nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi
shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin te/ gzugs kyi skus rab
tu phye ba ma yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smon par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shes
par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdan par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ bsgom par
bya| bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams brgya pa
las skyes pa'i blo dang don gcig tu bstan pa yin te/ chos las skyes pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ zab pa/ tshad med pa/ tshad med
pa'i chos/ mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par ba shig pa/ mi g.yo ba/ mi gnas pa/ shin tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ mi snang ba/ mig gi
lam las yang dag par 'das pa ni chos kyi skur rab tu shes par bya ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa'i sa dang bral ba/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/ spros pa
thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la smon par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra las shin tu 'das pa'i snying po ste 'dod chags las yang
dag par 'das pa/ dbyer mi phyed pa ste zhe sdang las yang dag par 'das pa/ brtan pa ste gti mug las yang dag par 'das pa/ stong pa nyid du bstan pas nges par bstan pa/ ma
skyes pa/ skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ tha snyad du brtags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ bye brag med pa/ sgras mya ngan las 'das pa/ dbyangs kyis zhi ba/ brdas
mtshungs par gyur pa/ don dam pas brdar gyur pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba'i tshig gis don dam pa/ yongs su gdung ba med pas bsil ba/ gnas med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ kha
dog bstan pas mu med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyang ba las byung ba ste/ gzhon nu/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'di 'dra'i 'jig rten mgon po'i sku/ /su dag shes par 'dod pa ni/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni sgom gyis dang / /sangs rgyas
sku ni shes par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dag pa ste/ /bsod nams brgya skyes 'od kyang gsal/ /de ni bar snang mtshungs pa ste/ /de la tha dad bya
ba med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba/ /mtshan rnams kyang ni de 'dra ste/ /de yi mtshan rnams ci 'dra ba/ /de yi sku yang de 'dra'o/ /sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/ /
sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing / /stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang / /de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig /de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon
po'i de 'dra bas/ /sus kyang sha yi mig gis ni/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /mang po dag kyang 'di skad smra/ /ngas ni 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong / /sku yang gser gyi kha dog
la| |'jig rten thams cad snang bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs dang / /mthu dang rnam par sprul pa yis/ /de ltar mtshan gyis spras pa yi/ /sku dag shin tu snang ba yin
bong tshod khrun dang sboms su yang / /sangs rgyas sku ni bshad mod kyi/ /sku yi tshad mi ma rnyed de/ /de phyir bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'di tsam zhes/ /gal te tshad kyang
rnyed gyur na/ /lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang / /ston pa bye brag med par 'gyur/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyi ni/ /rnam par smin pa'ang de yi mtshan/ /ming dang gzugs
kyang de 'dra mtshan/ /rnam par dag cing 'od gsal 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pa ltar/ /sus kyang ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di/ /nam yang goms par
ma byas so/ /dkar po'i chos ni mang po yis/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bskyed bste/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bas/ /nga yi lus kyang mi snang ngo / /gang gi sems ni ci 'dra ba/ /ming dang gzugs
kyang de 'dra ste/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sems kyi ni/ /ming dang gzugs kyang mtshan de 'dra/ /ming dang gzugs la gang gi ni/ /'du shes rags pa 'jug pa yang / /skal pa mi mnyam
'du shes kyis/ /rags pa'i sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /ming dang gzugs la su dag gi /'du shes phra mo 'jug pa ni/ /ming dang gzugs la ma chags pas/ /sems ni rab tu
'od gsal 'gyur/ /ngas dran sngon gyi tshe rabs ni/ /grangs med pa dag bdun du yang / /sdig pa'i 'du shes gsum po dag /nam yang skyes par ma gyur to/ /nga yis sems ni zag med de//
bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang / /nga yi lus ni mi snang ngo / /ji ltar gang gi dngos po las/ /yid kyang rnam par grol gyur pa/ /de dag
de yi dngos po dang / /phyir yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po kun las rnam pa kun/ /nga yi rnam shes rnam grol te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /phyir yang ye
shes 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong du/ /nga yi sprul pa dag kyang 'gro/ /sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed/ /de la lus kyang rnyed mi
'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin du/ /nga yi sku yang brjod med cing / /shes par dka' bar rab tu bstan/ /dpa' bo chen po chos
kyi sku/ /sku ni chos las skyes pa ste/ /gzugs kyi skur rin nam du yang / /rgyal ba gdags par yong mi nus/ /ji ltar bshad pa 'di dag kyang / /thos nas dga' bar 'gyur
ba ni| |de la sdig can bdud kyis kyang / /glan ka rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /zab mo yi ni chos thos nas/ /de la skrag pa mi 'byung ste/ /de ni srog gi phyir du yang / /sangs
rgyas byang chub spong mi byed/ /mdo sde bye ba phrag stong gi/ yang dag bstan pa shes par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du song bar yang / /'jig rten dag la snang bar 'gyur/ /
gzhon nu/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang las kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin te/ sngon po'am/ kha dog sngon po'am/ sngon po lta bur ston pa'am
'od sngon po 'byung ba'am/ ser po'am/ kha dog ser po'am/ ser po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od ser po 'byung ba'am/ dmar po'am/ kha dog dmar po'am/ dmar
po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba'am/ dkar po'am/ kha dog dkar po'am/ dkar po lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba'am/ le brgan nam/ kha dog le
brgan nam/ le brgan lta bur ston pa'am/ 'od le brgan 'byung ba'am/ shes lam/ shel gyi kha dog gam/ shel lta bur ston pa'am/ shel gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ me'am/
me'i kha dog gam/ me lta bur ston pa'am/ me'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ mar gyi snying po'am/ mar gyi kha dog gam/ mar lta bur ston pa'am/ mar gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ gser
ram| gser gyi kha dog gam/ gser lta bur ston pa'am/ gser gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/ bai DUR+ya'am/ bai DUR+ya'i kha dog gam/ bai DUR+ya lta bur ston pa'am/ bai DUR+ya'i 'od 'byung
ba'am/ glog gam/ glog gi kha dog gam/ glog lta bur ston pa'am/ glog gi 'od 'byung ba'am/ tshangs pa'am/ tshangs pa'i kha dog gam/ tshangs pa lta bur ston pa'am/
tshangs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'am/ lha 'am/ lha'i kha dog gam/ lha lta bur ston pa'am/ lha'i 'od 'byung ba'o zhes shes par sla ba ma yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku ni dag bste/ mtshan ma dag gis bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa/ mtshan ma thams cad kyis kyang bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/ bsam gyis
mi khyab par bstan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang
gzugs kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pas sku'i tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams
kyi rdul phran dang / /rdul du ming yang ston pa dang / /mche'u dang rdzing dang lteng ka dang / /rgya mtsho na yang ji snyed chu/ /'di snyed rdul phran yod do zhes/ /de dag la ni mtha' mi rnyed//
rgya mtsho la ni skra rtse yis/ /chu thigs gzhal bar nus kyang ni/ /'jig rten mgon po'i dpe nyid du/ /yang dag bstan par mi rung ngo / /chu yi thigs pa dpag med cing / /de
bzhin rab tu phra ba'i rdul/ /de bas sems can gcig gi yang / /shin tu mang du ngas mthong ste/ /mos pa dang ni sems bskyed pa/ /du ma dag ni shes mi sla/ /ngas ni sku
yi yon tan dag /yang dag pa ni gang bstan pa/ /sems can kun gyi mos pa yang / /de dag dpe ru bzod mi 'gyur/ /mtshan ma dang ni las rnams dang / /kha dog snang ba 'di
'dra zhes/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni shes mi nus/ /nga yi bye brag de 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma bral ba ste/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /zab cing dpag tu med pa ste/ /de phyir
sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sku yang bsam du med/ /sku de bsam du med pa yi/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /sangs rgyas sku ni sems
kyis kyang / /bsam par bzod pa ma yin te/ /de ltar de yi sku la yang / /chad kyang nye bar mi dmigs so/ /chos rnams de dag spag tu med/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pas na/ /
de phyir nga yi lus kyang ni/ /'od gsal bsam du med pa grub/ /sems can kun gyis gzung du med/ /tshad kyis gzung bya ma yin te/ /de lta sangs rgyas sku dag ni/ /tshad med
bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /tshad med pa yi chos dag gis/ /de la tshad ni brtag tu med/ /ma brtag pa yi chos dag gis/ /de ltar sangs rgyas ma brtags so/ /rtog pa dag ni tshad
du bstan/ /rtog pa med pa tshad med yin/ /mi rtog rtog dang bral bas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas bsam du med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' tshad med la/ /sus kyang gzhal du mi nus
pa| |de bzhin sangs rgyas sku dag kyang / /nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra zhing mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas sku ni de lta bur/ /gang gis rig pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab
pa| |sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas kyang
bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du bya bar 'dod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig
pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi mngon sum du bya'o snyam na/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cig kha ton du bya/ nyon
mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ de la chos
so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gzhon nu/ gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed yod pa/ gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang de snyed do/ /de
bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ji snyed ba dang / gzhon nu/ rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod
pa'ang de snyed de/ gzhon nu/ de ltar gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas mu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
ste| de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gzhon nu/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa mtha' yas mu med de/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin
du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar 'dus byas la'ang nyes pa grangs med/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang phan
yon grangs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ji snyed yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bsngags pa'ang de snyed do/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar mya ngan 'das pa'i ming grangs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do/ /gzhon nu/ 'di bzhi ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa ste/ de dag mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ni ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
'du byed brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba
brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ gzhon nu/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi
khyab par brjod pa bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/ de dag ni mthar
phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhi po de dag nyid de/ de bzhin du rgyas par bstan par bya'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi rigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun
nas nyon mongs pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bstan pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
zhe na| 'du byed nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nges par bstan
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra bzhi ste/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi tshig bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi
tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi lha la nges par rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag
ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming la rtog pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ming la rtog pa
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/
'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun
nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di
bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa
sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag
ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di
dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i
tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang | 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyod pa'i
tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyad
pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mu med
pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /
gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
rnam par byang ba gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'du byed grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa grangs
med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi dpag tu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa tshad
med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di
bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su
bshad pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du
byed yongs su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
mdo sde bsags pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsags ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mang du thos pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag
ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bzhi
ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bslab pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe
na/ 'du byed kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las bzhi
ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
'du byed kyi spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom par bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed
kyi lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lam bsgom pa
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun nas nyon
mongs pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//
gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam
par byang ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma rig pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
zhe na| 'du byed kyi ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sdug
bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbul po shes pa bzhi
ste| bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dbul po shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon
mongs pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi skye ba shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyi rol shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i phyi rol shes pa
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon
nu| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
rnam par byang ba'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang
zhe na/ 'du byed kyi bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs ba'i bden pa
shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid
pa shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi dngos po shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi gang zag shes pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/ /gzhon nu/
'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa bzhi ste/ mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma
yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du byed kyi dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas
nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /
gzungs bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs dang po'o/ /dbyangs mtha' yas par
bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gnyis pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gsum pa'o/ /
rnam par byang ba'i yon tan gyis phan yon mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs bzhi pa ste/ gzungs bzhi po ni 'di dag go /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar
gzungs gang yin pa de ni shes pa'o/ /de ni chos so/ /'di ltar chos shes pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /chos shes pa la don gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par
rig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos shes pa la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos shes pa la tha snyad du ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'dogs
pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / tshig thogs pa med pa dang / tshig mi 'dor zhing ma lkugs
mi dig pa dang / tshig zhum pa med pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
so| |sangs rgyas ye shes ji snyed pa/ /gzugs su brtags pa'ang de snyed do/ /gzugs su brtags pa ji snyed pa/ /gzugs su brjod pa'ang de snyed do/ /gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed
pa| |tshul khrims ming yang de snyed de/ /tshul khrims ming yang ji snyed pa/ /sangs rgyas ming yang de snyed do/ /sangs rgyas ming ni ji snyed pa/ /sems can ming yang de snyed do/ /sems
can gcig gi ming yang ni/ /de snyed du ni ngas bshad do/ /ming dang brjod pa mtha' yas pa/ /gang dag ngas ni sngar bshad rnams/ /tshul khrims ming dang sangs rgyas ming / /sems
can ming dang de dag mtshungs/ /'dus byas nyes pa ji snyed pa/ /mya ngan 'das bsngags de snyed de/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bsngags pa dang / /dpe yang de snyed ngas bshad do/ /ji snyed
sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems rnams skye ba nges bsten pa/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spu gcig nas/ /'od zer dag kyang de snyed 'byung / /sems can kun gyi mos pa dang / /ming
rnams ji snyed yod pa bas/ /de bas mi yi dbang po yi/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsngags pa mang / /sems can kun gyis ming yod pa/ /de dag sems can gcig la bstan/ /sems
can gcig ming ji snyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi ming du bstan/ /so so yang dag rig 'jug pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
phyir yang ni/ /ming rnams mtha' yas nges par bstan/ /mdo sde bye ba bsam yas rnams/ /ji ltar bshad snyam gang sems pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab brjod la/ /zhum pa med par
bshad par gyis/ /'khor gyi nang du thogs med par/ /mdo sde bye ba rab tu 'chad/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med pa/ /de bzhin de la'ang chos rnams ston/ /de ltar byang chub
sems dpa' dag /sems can dag pa skyob pa rnams/ /mdo sde 'di dag bzung nas ni/ /ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /dad pas ji lta ji ltar bur/ /tshul 'di rab tu

ston byed pa/ /de bzhin de yi ye shes 'phel/ /gangs ri la ni sdong po bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/ gzhon nu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod na
chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta bas gzugs las gzhan du byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs las gzhan du'ang byang chub la mi spyod/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang
byang chub yongs su mi 'tshol/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang byang chub yang dag par mi sgrub/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud/ gzugs
las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ste/ gzugs kyi mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par lta'o/ /gzugs kyang gzhan gzugs
kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi lta'o/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gzhan no zhes de ltar yang mi lta'o/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod do/ /de
bzhin du tshor ba las gzhan du ma yin/ 'du shes las gzhan du ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las gzhan du ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du byang chub mi mthong / rnam
par shes pa las gzhan du'ang byang chub la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang byang chub yongs su mi 'tshol/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang byang chub yang dag
bar mi sgrub/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du 'ang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
gshegs pa mi mthong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par lta'o/ /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan/ rnam par
shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi lta'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gzhan no zhes de ltar yang mi lta'o/ /rnam par
shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos
so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gzugs kyis kyang ni byang chub bstan/ /byang chub kyis
kyang gzugs bstan te/ /mi mtshungs pa yi sgra rnams kyis/ /chos kyi bla ma rab tu bstan/ /sgra yis gzugs kyi bla ma ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dag /gzugs dang byang chub
mnyam pa ste/ /tha dad bya ba de mi rnyed/ /mya ngan 'das pa zab par yang / /sgra yis rab tu bstan pa ltar/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed de/ /de yi sgra yang mi rnyed do/ /sgra dang mya ngan
'das pa ni/ /gnyi ga rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams la/ /mya ngan 'das pa rab tu bstan/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'da' ba ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed do/ /'di
ni chos rnams 'jug med pa/ /phyi sa ni ci 'dra de bzhin sngon/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs mnyam par/ /sangs rgyas bstan la brtson
pa yi/ /'byung ba lhur byed rnams kyis rig /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku mthong nas/ /'dren pa mthong zhing smra mod kyi/ /nga ni gzugs kyi sku lus su/ /sus kyang blta bar mi nus so/ /
gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes te/ /gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes na/ /nga yi sku yang nges par bstan/ /de bzhin phung po lnga rnams kyi/ /chos kyi mtshan
nyid ngas shes te/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shes nas ni/ /chos kyi sku la rab tu gnas/ /chos kyi sku la rab gnas nas/ /sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /chos kyi sku la mi brten par
sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas dag gi chos rnams ni/ /tshig gis bshad par mi nus te/ /'di 'dra'i tshul rnams mi shes pas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra thos
nas| |tshig tsam gyis ni 'di skad smra/ /ngas ni 'dren pa mthong zhes te/ /'du shes thams cad spangs pa la/ /srid par 'du shes med par 'gyur/ /sgrar ni 'du shes 'dzin pa la/ /
nam yang ston pa mthong ba med/ /'di lta bu yi gzugs kyi mtshan/ /stong pa nyid ni sus shes pa/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin gzhan yin la/ /stong nyid gzhan
du ma gsungs te/ /gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/ /des ni stong nyid rab tu shes/ /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra bar/ /stong pa gang gis rab shes pa/ /des ni bdud
rnams bye ba snyed/ /zil gyis mnan te pham byed nus/ /gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/ /des ni stong pa nyid kyang shes/ /gang gis stong nyid rab shes pa/ /des ni mya ngan
'das pa shes/ /rnam pa 'di ni mi shes pas/ /dmigs pa can rnams rab tu brlag /dngos po med la dngos 'dzin cing / /dngos med la yang dngos su 'dzin/ /shes kyi khe
yis bslus pa dag /nga yi bstan las shin tu 'khyams/ /'bras bur 'du shes gnas pa la/ /dge sbyong nor ni gsog tu gyur/ /brtson 'grus nyams pa le lo can/ /tshul khrims
phung por mi gnas pa/ /kun nas langs pas smra ba ni/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bshad ma yin/ /la la dag ni 'di skad du/ /bdag cag byang chub zhugs zhes zer/ /ma dul zhing ni
ma byang ba/ /gcig la gcig kyang ri mo med/ /chos dag la yang mi gnas shing / /sgra 'dod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de lta bu ni de mos te/ /shes kyi khe ni 'chol ba'i phyir/ /
'dus pa dag la sems byed cing / /rnyed pa 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyags dang bag med zil non pas/ /rnyed dang bkur sti don du gnyer/ /bkur sti rnyed la brten nas ni/ /shes
kyi khe rnams 'tshol ba dag /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten byed/ /khyim mi mo la chags shing myos/ /dmigs pa dag la brten byed cing / /'dod pa'i srid la shin tu gnas/ /
bdud kyi yul du gnas nas ni/ /khyim pa dag gi las byed 'gyur/ /'dod pa me lce 'dra ba ni/ /khyim pa dag la ston par 'gyur/ /de dag gi yang khyim zhugs nas/ /de yi rigs kyang
sun byed 'gyur/ /de dag la ni khyim pa rnams/ /ston pa nyid du 'du shes 'gyur/ /rab tu gnas bcas de dag gi /bu dang chung ma sun par byed/ /su dag de la zas skom gyis/ /phan
'dogs pa ni byed par 'gyur/ /de yi bu mo bud med la/ /chung ma nyid du 'du shes 'gyur/ /de dag 'dir ni rab byung nas/ /ji ltar gzhan gyi bud med chags/ /khyim pa bdag gi
chung ma la/ /de ltar mos shing chags mi 'gyur/ /khyim pa skye bo'i gos gyon la/ /ngas ni bslab pa gang bshad pa/ /de tshe dge slong de dag la/ /bslab pa de yang med par 'gyur/ /
de dag rnga dung rdza rnga yis/ /nga la mchod pa byed 'gyur te/ /mchod pa'i dam pa gang yin pa/ /nan tan 'di ni med par 'gyur/ /de dag bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal/ /tshul khrims
gnas pa mthong nas ni/ /phan tshun du yang 'di skad du/ /'di dag nged dang 'dra zhes smra/ /sdig pa'i spyod yul tshul khrims 'chal/ /de dag tshul khrims
bsngags thos nas/ /kun nas langs pa 'di skad du/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa 'di min smra/ /de dag la ni ngo tsha med/ /dge sbyong gi ni nor stor te/ /mi bden tshig gis rtsod byed cing / /
sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu spong / /ngan sems ldan pa de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di bor te/ /chos rnams rab tu spangs nas ni/ /mnar med par yang gnas par 'gyur//
gang dag spyod pa de 'dra ba/ /ngas ni ma thos ma mthong ste/ /byis pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes thob mi 'gyur/ /de dag gi yang tshul 'chos dang / /de la g.yo
yang ci yod pa/ /thams cad de bzhin ngas shes te/ /de la nga yi ye shes 'jug /de yi 'khrul pa mang po ni/ /gal te bskal par rab bshad kyang / /byang chub sems dpar khas
'che yi/ /cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/ /gzhon nur gyur pa de dag ni/ /sdig pa mi byed yong med de/ /phyi ma'i dus la de dag dang / /khyod ni ston par ma byed cig /smra ba
